title: How do companies send mass text messages? - Quora

response.answer_text: Companies are able to send mass text messages through third-party apps. Here is an article that talks about some popular apps you can send SMS texts with. Businesses have started using mass text messaging because it gets your customer’s attention in a way that email can’t match. Not only are people more likely to see text messages, but texts have a 98% open rate. There are many mass text messaging systems on the market, but remember, mass text messages are just part of the puzzle to providing a great customer experience. Hope this answer helped. Cheers!
